longDescription: This stunning 5-bedroom house offers a spacious living room filled with natural light, a modern and fully-equipped kitchen, and a luxurious master bedroom. The property boasts a beautiful garden perfect for entertaining, a private balcony for relaxation, and ample parking space. Located in a quiet neighborhood, it’s ideal for families or professionals.
keyFeatures: Private parking for up to 3 vehicles
Recently renovated kitchen with modern appliances

longDescription: This charming 7-bedroom house offers an inviting living space with a cozy fireplace, a modern open-plan kitchen, and a spacious dining area. The property includes a well-maintained garden, perfect for outdoor activities, and a private driveway for convenience. Situated close to schools, parks, and shops, it’s the perfect family home.
keyFeatures: 4 bathrooms, including an en-suite in the master bedroom
Landscaped garden with a patio for outdoor dining
Secure private driveway for multiple vehicles

longDescription: This expansive 8-bedroom house is perfect for large families or those who love to entertain. Featuring a grand living room, a state-of-the-art kitchen with top-notch appliances, and a spacious backyard, this property has it all. Located in a prestigious area, it offers easy access to transport links, schools, and local amenities.
keyFeatures: 8 bedrooms, including a master suite with walk-in closets
A spacious backyard with potential for landscaping
Grand living room with a fireplace

shortDescription: Emerald Heights: A cozy 2-bedroom flat available now
longDescription: This delightful 2-bedroom flat is located in a secure and modern development. It features a bright open-plan living area, a contemporary kitchen, and two spacious bedrooms with built-in wardrobes. The property also offers access to a shared garden, a gym, and secure parking. Ideal for young professionals or small families.
keyFeatures: Open-plan living space with ample natural light

shortDescription: Maple Grove: Spacious 5-bedroom flat available now
longDescription: This luxurious 5-bedroom flat offers breathtaking views, a modern interior design, and spacious rooms throughout. The flat includes a high-end kitchen, a large living room with floor-to-ceiling windows, and en-suite bathrooms for added privacy. Amenities include a swimming pool, a gym, and a concierge service.
keyFeatures: Access to a swimming pool, gym, and concierge services

shortDescription: Crystal Towers: A luxury 8-bedroom flat available now
longDescription: Experience unmatched luxury in this 8-bedroom flat located in one of the city’s most sought-after areas. With elegant interiors, premium finishes, and state-of-the-art facilities, this property sets a new standard for modern living. Enjoy access to a private gym, swimming pool, and rooftop terrace with panoramic views.
keyFeatures: Private gym and swimming pool access

longDescription: Discover a stunning 6-bedroom house in NW6, blending contemporary style with practical living. keyFeatures: 6 spacious bedrooms, including a master suite
